translation.en: NETFLIX PRESENTS
[Laura] You shouldn't be here.
-♪ No one is perfect enough ♪ -[Laura] I don't have panties.
[in Polish] I couldn't find anything decent.
New house, new wardrobe, but it's still the same old mess.
translation.es: Casa y guardarropa nuevos, pero el mismo desorden.

translation.en: [screams, in English] What the hell are you doing here?
You're sick people. You know that?
[in Polish] You deviants! Freaks! Filthy perverts!
[in English] Massimo, you have to get out of here!
It brings bad luck to see the bride before the wedding.
translation.es: Es de mala suerte verla antes de la boda.

translation.en: Not to say to bang her and ruin her makeup!
translation.es: Y peor aún, ¡te la coges y le arruinas el maquillaje!

translation.en: [in Polish] You're driving me crazy. You'd give Grandma Krysia a heart attack.
translation.es: Me vuelves loca. A la abuela le daría un infarto.

translation.en: -[in English] Are you jealous? -Listen to me.
Please have some respect for Polish tradition, okay?
translation.es: Por favor, respeten las tradiciones polacas. ¿Bueno?

translation.en: If you want, next time you can join us.
Go, go, go!
Adiós, amigos. Ciao, bella!
[in Polish] Or whatever you people say.
[in English] See you later, alligator!
[in Polish] It was supposed to be perfect. The wedding, the dress, and you.
translation.es: Todo debía ser hermoso. La boda, el vestido, tú. ¿Y yo?

translation.en: And I was supposed to be relaxing.
Just look at you. [scoffs]
I'm not gonna get on your ass about it, but you never smoke.
translation.es: No es por criticarte, pero no solías fumar.

translation.en: Whatever. If you wanna pretend to be a badass, fine.
translation.es: Si quieres fingir ser ruda, adelante.

translation.en: [Olga] But I need to know something.
You haven't told him, have you?
Okay. None of my business.
You've been trying to tell him, though, right?
I think about it every day.
translation.es: Pienso en eso todos los días.

translation.en: Massimo can never know I was pregnant.
translation.es: Massimo no puede saber que estaba embarazada.

translation.en: [Olga] That's great.
A dark secret is the foundation of any successful relationship.
translation.es: Un secreto oscuro es la base de una buena relación.

translation.en: [Laura] What should I do?
Tell him I lost the baby in the tunnel where I almost died?
translation.es: ¿Decirle que su hijo murió en el túnel donde casi muero?

translation.en: Do you know what he'd do?
What?
[Laura] These people aren't normal.
A war would break out.
[scoffs] A war? Come on.
You know Massimo.
He never lets things go.
Know what a "vendetta" is?
You do realize we're in Sicily, right?
I mean, I've heard the word before.
In movies. Who hasn't? Of course I know what it means.
translation.es: En las películas. Claro que sé qué significa.

translation.en: Oh shit.
I wasn't thinking.
It was the hardest decision of my life.
translation.es: Es la decisión más difícil que he tomado.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You're the strongest woman I've ever met. You know that?
translation.es: Eres la mujer más fuerte que he conocido.

translation.en: Remember, you're not alone. I'm here for you.
translation.es: Recuerda que no estás sola. Estoy aquí para ti.

translation.en: So, do you love him?
Okay, let's go.
Help me get ready. I promise I won't forget my panties this time.
translation.es: Vamos, debo arreglarme. Prometo no olvidar mi ropa interior.

translation.en: Here you go. Pick any color you like.
translation.es: Toma. Elige el color que quieras.

translation.en: What am I saying? They're all white.
[Massimo] Let's run away from all this mess.
You have one hour.
Then… I'll do whatever I want with you.
translation.es: Entonces, haré lo que quiera contigo.

translation.en: No. I'll do whatever I want with you.
translation.es: No. Yo haré lo que quiera contigo.

translation.en: Sit down.
I don't wanna hurt you.
And now… I want you to fuck me the way I like.
translation.es: Y ahora quiero que me cojas como me gusta.

translation.en: You think this flower will help make me forget that yesterday
translation.es: ¿Crees que esta flor me hará olvidar que ayer preferiste estar con tus amigos mafiosos que conmigo?

translation.en: you preferred the company of your Mafia fellows over mine?
translation.es: preferiste estar con tus amigos mafiosos que conmigo?

translation.en: Nope.
[Domenico] But it makes you smile.
How do I look like?
Like the first time, baby.
[Laura] It will be a perfect honeymoon, husband.
translation.es: Será una luna de miel perfecta, esposo.

translation.en: [Olga, in Polish] Shit.
[in Italian] Shit.
[Olga, in Polish] You changed your hair!
translation.es: ¡Mierda! Te cambiaste el color de pelo.

translation.en: [in English] Welcome home!
[in Polish] Nice to see you too. I didn't know we had to bring food.
translation.es: Lindo verte también. No sabía que debíamos traer comida.

translation.en: I'm living my best life. I fell in love.
translation.es: Vivo la vida al máximo. Me enamoré.

translation.en: And when exactly did that happen?
You're the last person who should be criticizing me.
translation.es: Eres la última persona que debería criticarme.

translation.en: I'm wondering how many pieces of furniture I'll need to replace.
translation.es: Me pregunto cuántos muebles debemos cambiar.

translation.en: Would you be so kind as to make a list of everything that's been tainted?
translation.es: ¿Puedes hacer una lista de todo lo que está sucio?

translation.en: Want a raspberry? In Italian, it's called "lampone."
[Laura] You can stick your lampone up your ass.
translation.es: Métete tu lampone por el culo.

translation.en: [in English] I would like to propose you two catch up in a different location
translation.es: Señoras, pónganse al día en otro lugar

translation.en: 'cause Domenico, now he needs to focus on work.
translation.es: porque Domenico y yo debemos trabajar.

translation.en: Of course, when he's wearing a normal suit and not…
What is that, a… a cake or something?
translation.es: ¿Qué es eso, un pastel o algo así?

translation.en: [in Italian] Cream.
[in English] Um, I arranged a little trip for you two.
translation.es: Organicé un viaje para las dos.

translation.en: Do I look like furniture that you can move around?
translation.es: ¿Crees que soy un mueble que puedes mover?

translation.en: -I want you to have fun with your friend. -Oh, really?
translation.es: - Quiero que te diviertas con ella. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: -It's not a joke. -[Laura] Why don't you put a leash on me?
translation.es: - No es una broma. - ¿Por qué no me pones una correa?

translation.en: Oh, I can see honeymoon is over.
translation.es: Veo que la luna de miel terminó.

translation.en: [in Polish] Shut up.
Calm down. We could use a vacation.
translation.es: Cálmate. Nos vendrían bien unas vacaciones.

translation.en: It's been so long, I've forgotten what alcohol looks like.
translation.es: Olvidé a qué sabe un trago.

translation.en: -[in Italian] I'll be in the office. -All right.
translation.es: Te espero en mi oficina. Está bien.

translation.en: [in Polish] What's on your mind?
Nothing. I'm just enjoying being here.
translation.es: Es sencillo. Me siento bien aquí.

translation.en: -Is that why you're acting so serious? -[Laura] I'm not.
translation.es: - ¿Por eso estás tan seria? - No estoy seria.

translation.en: I just feel bad about Massimo.
He's making a real effort. He arranged this trip.
Sometimes I think I'm just like my mom. [Olga] Uh-uh.
translation.es: A veces actúo como mi madre.

translation.en: Nope. Even worse. You're a typical wife.
Thanks, Olga. I can always count on you.
No worries. Happy to help.
translation.es: No hay problema. A tu servicio.

translation.en: Listen. It's simple, really.
You know what Massimo likes, so just do that.
translation.es: Sabes qué le gusta a Massimo y lo haces.

translation.en: Oh shit!
I've got an idea.
[in English] It is so late.
I'm sure you can spend a few more minutes with me.
translation.es: Podrías quedarte otro rato más conmigo.

translation.en: I promise you won't regret it.
I know. [sighs]
But it's very late. I have to leave.
translation.es: Pero es muy tarde. Debo irme.

translation.en: [Massimo] We're back to our normal life, baby girl, aren't we?
translation.es: Volvimos a nuestra vida normal, muñeca. ¿No?

translation.en: [man] Oh yeah. Oh yeah.
-[woman gasps] -[man] You're beautiful.
[Laura, in Polish] Holy shit.
-[in Italian] Shit. -[in Polish] Knock first.
-Get dressed. We're leaving. -[Olga] Domenico isn't going anywhere.
translation.es: - Deberías golpear. - Vístete. Nos vamos. Domenico no se irá aún.

translation.en: I'll be back in 30 minutes.
translation.es: Olga, regreso en 30 minutos. Está lista, ¿sí?

translation.en: Be ready by then, okay?
At least be dressed.
Or just be out from under him!
-[in English] We need to finish. -[both moaning]
[Domenico] Oh yes!
[in Polish] Watch out. Careful! Wait.
You're filthy rich, and we still have to run on the grass!
translation.es: ¡Eres rica y tenemos que correr en el césped!

translation.en: -[in English] Ooh! Hi, George! -[both giggling]
[in Polish] Hey, let me drive this time.
-[sighs] We're here. -Come on.
-Just who will be paying for the damage? -What?
I drive around Włochy in Warsaw. If I can do it there, I can do it here.
translation.es: Conduzco por Wlochy, en Varsovia. Si conduzco allá, aquí también.

translation.en: Hop in.
Okay. [in English] Move out.
-[in Polish] No. Want me to sit and wave? -Scoot over. Come on.
translation.es: No. ¿Quieres que me siente y salude?

translation.en: Okay. I'll sit and wave.
I like it. Just look at me, sitting and waving.
translation.es: Me gusta sentarme y saludar. Mírame.

translation.en: [in Italian] Bye!
[in Polish] Let's go.
[in Polish] Remember how we met? No.
Remember your mom hanging out the window with a plate in her hand?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas a tu mamá en la ventana con un plato en la mano?

translation.en: [both, drawn out] Mom!
[Olga] How old were we back then? Six?
Mm-hmm. Even back then, you had powder on your plate.
translation.es: A esa edad ya te gustaba el polvo blanco.

translation.en: Hey! It was just powdered Jell-O.
translation.es: Solo el polvo de la gelatina.

translation.en: We ate it with our fingers and went roller-skating. Remember?
translation.es: Lo comíamos con los dedos e íbamos a patinar. ¿Recuerdas?

translation.en: Honestly? I prefer life now, 20 years later.
translation.es: Prefiero cómo son las cosas ahora, 20 años después.

translation.en: My skates weren't as fast as the Ferrari. Not for lack of trying.
translation.es: Mis patines no eran tan rápidos como el Ferrari.

translation.en: You know what?
It doesn't matter what we drive or what we eat,
translation.es: No importa qué auto conduzcamos ni qué comamos

translation.en: as long as we're together.
Forever.
With you, I don't even mind having to walk everywhere.
translation.es: Contigo, puedo caminar a todas partes.

translation.en: [Olga] Love you.
I love you too.
-[in Italian] How is everything? -Great.
Great, thanks.
[in Polish] I've missed this.
[Laura] Lately, everything's gone sideways. Yep.
translation.es: - Últimamente, todo ha salido mal. - Sí.

translation.en: Oh shit.
[in Polish] I guess we're not having dessert.
[in English] We're leaving.
[in Polish] Did you hear that?
[in English] I said… we're leaving.
I have needs.
I know that our beginnings were quite rough,
or more like sick.
You've kidnapped me, and this is sick.
translation.es: Me secuestraste. Esto está muy mal.

translation.en: But I fell in love with you, and we are together because I decided.
translation.es: Pero me enamoré de ti, y estamos juntos porque yo lo decidí.

translation.en: You cannot control people, and I won't let you control me.
translation.es: No puedes controlar a la gente. No me controlarás.

translation.en: -I'm your wife, not one of your soldiers. -What are you talking about?
translation.es: - Soy tu esposa, no uno de tus soldados. - ¿De qué hablas?

translation.en: -I just want to protect you. -[Laura] This is not protection.
translation.es: Solo quiero protegerte. No me proteges.

translation.en: This is prison.
I can't live without doing anything.
translation.es: No puedo vivir sin hacer nada.

translation.en: I miss challenges.
[Massimo] You're right, my girl. I screwed this up. ♪ You were in love with me ♪
translation.es: Tienes razón, cariño. Metí la pata.

translation.en: [echoing] Excuse me.
Mrs. Torricelli, right?
I didn't want to disturb you.
-[song fades] -Mrs. Torricelli, right?
I'm the new gardener, Nacho.
[Laura] Nacho?
Nacho. Nice to meet you.
You have a nice cap.
[chuckles] Yes, I know. Thank you.
[Laura] But Nacho? It doesn't sound very Italian.
translation.es: No es un nombre típico de Italia.

translation.en: It's a nickname.
My family has Spanish roots.
And you? Where are you from?
Poland.
Thirsty?
[Nacho] Oh, yes.
Thank you.
How long have you been working for my husband?
[Nacho] I just started.
Mr. Torricelli wants some changes in the garden.
translation.es: El señor Torricelli quiere remodelar el jardín.

translation.en: I have to work.
I wouldn't like to waste your precious time.
translation.es: No quiero hacerla perder su valioso tiempo.

translation.en: Wasting my time?
You're talking to a person who has absolutely nothing to do.
translation.es: Habla con alguien que no tiene nada que hacer.

translation.en: Now my only job is being a… wife.
translation.es: Mi único trabajo es ser esposa.

translation.en: How pathetic is that?
You're wrong, missus.
Being a good wife is one of the most difficult jobs in the world.
translation.es: Ser buena esposa es uno de los trabajos más difíciles.

translation.en: [scoffs] It's why I'm so perfect at it.
'Cause I don't have to do anything.
translation.es: Porque no tengo que hacer nada.

translation.en: They cook for me. They clean for me. Even they cut flowers for me.
translation.es: Cocinan para mí. Limpian para mí. Hasta me cortan las flores.

translation.en: It's why I'm so perfect at doing nothing.
translation.es: Por eso soy tan perfecta para no hacer nada.

translation.en: You are a real busy bee.
That's a great talent.
To be perfect without doing anything.
[chuckles] Please don't tell me that you also make money by doing nothing.
translation.es: No me diga que también gana dinero sin hacer nada, por favor.

translation.en: Where do you think it all comes from?
You need to teach me that.
[woman] Mrs. Torricelli!
I must go. Thank you for the water.
translation.es: Debo irme. Gracias por el agua.

translation.en: Ah. I will cut some flowers for you.
It was a pleasure, Laura from Poland.
It was a pleasure, Nacho the gardener.
translation.es: Fue un placer, Nacho el jardinero.

translation.en: So, let's see what's inside.
Congrats.
You are the owner of your own clothing company.
translation.es: Eres la dueña de tu propia empresa de ropa.

translation.en: So, I know that you love work,
and I want you to be free to do what you love.
translation.es: Quiero que hagas lo que te encanta.

translation.en: And I know that you love fashion.
-♪ All I want is you ♪ -[mouthing] I love you.
[Laura] It's hard to get a present for someone who has everything.
translation.es: Es difícil conseguir un regalo para alguien que lo tiene todo.

translation.en: But I will give you something I think you should like.
translation.es: Pero te daré algo que creo que te gustará.

translation.en: -What? -♪ I will take care of you ♪
Open it…
if you're brave enough.
Is this a fucking summer-edition proposal?
Or it's real?
[chuckles] Pumpkin.
[in Italian] Will you marry me?
[in English] Baby.
I don't want to sound impatient, but…
I think that Santa has forgotten me.
translation.es: pero creo que Santa se olvidó de mí.

translation.en: Santa is coming.
He will let you know where is the present.
translation.es: Él te dirá dónde está el regalo.

translation.en: What?
Be patient.
I think I've seen this before.
Now the only thing that's missing is the lion.
This is your present, Don Massimo.
translation.es: Este es tu regalo, don Massimo.

translation.en: I trust you.
I want to give you everything you wanna take.
translation.es: Quiero darte todo lo que quieras.

translation.en: Everything is there.
♪ Don't get me wrong ♪ ♪ But I don't like promises ♪
Thank you for arranging the arrival of my parents.
translation.es: Gracias por organizar la visita de mis padres.

translation.en: It was a wonderful gift.
[softly] Anything for you.
Don't you miss your family?
Because, besides Domenico, you have nobody.
translation.es: Además de Domenico, no tienes a nadie.

translation.en: You had Mario.
It was Mario's own decision to retire.
I didn't make him do it.
He couldn't deal with…
After the accident, he was blaming himself for what happened,
translation.es: Después del accidente, se culpó de lo que pasó,

translation.en: but I know that he couldn't do anything.
translation.es: pero sé que no pudo hacer nada.

translation.en: But… he's a man of honor.
translation.es: Pero es un hombre de honor.

translation.en: And I've lost my right hand.
Yeah.
I know how important he was in your life.
translation.es: Sé lo importante que fue en tu vida.

translation.en: Sometimes I think that, uh,
you feel so lonely…
'cause besides me, you have no one.
translation.es: porque solo me tienes a mí.

translation.en: No parents, no siblings.
I have a brother.
But I'd rather not have him.
But… correct me if I'm wrong…
Do we still have something to try out?
You have a brother? And you didn't tell me about this before?
translation.es: ¿Tienes un hermano? ¿Y no me lo contaste?

translation.en: I still have some work to do.
No, do not tell me that you're about to leave.
translation.es: No me digas que te vas.

translation.en: -Massimo! -[door opens]
[Olga, in Polish] This is one hell of a present.
[Emily, in English] Hello, ladies. I am Emily.
-Hello. -I'm glad you're here.
translation.es: - Hola. - Me alegra que estés aquí.

translation.en: -[both kiss twice] -Thank you so much.
I'm Laura, and this is my best friend, Olga.
translation.es: Soy Laura, y ella es Olga, mi mejor amiga.

translation.en: [in Italian] Hello!
[Emily, in English] Hi.
[in Italian] Let's go.
[in Polish] Luxury is my middle name.
-[in English] Do you like it? -[gasps] Amazing.
If I understand correctly, we have to talk about business
translation.es: Si no me equivoco, tenemos que hablar de negocios después del año nuevo.

translation.en: after the New Year.
translation.es: tenemos que hablar de negocios después del año nuevo.

translation.en: And today we have to make you look like superstars. Is that right?
translation.es: Hoy tenemos que hacerlas ver como superestrellas, ¿no?

translation.en: Sure, sure. But remember, I'm the hot goddess.
translation.es: Claro. Pero recuerda que soy la diosa sexy.

translation.en: You get used to her.
Or not.
[in Italian] Mia, can we begin?
[Mia] Of course.
Come on in.
[in Polish] Laura, what's going on?
-Nothing. -What do you mean? Something's wrong.
translation.es: - Nada. - ¿Qué quieres decir? Algo anda mal.

translation.en: -I don't want to talk about it. -Do I have to force it out of you?
translation.es: - No quiero hablar de eso. - ¿Te obligo a hablar?

translation.en: I'm pissed off at Massimo.
But I'm not discussing it with him or with you.
translation.es: Pero no hablaré de ello ni con él ni contigo.

translation.en: I get it. I respect your decision. Booze would help.
translation.es: Respeto tu decisión. Vamos a beber.

translation.en: [in English] It's enough for me. I want to go back.
[in Italian] Excuse me.
[in English] Can't you see I'm in the middle of a conversation?
translation.es: Estoy en medio de una conversación.

translation.en: Yeah. You're so gentle, talking to him,
translation.es: Qué amable que hables con él.

translation.en: but talking to me, it's a different situation, right?
I have one more last conversation.
[quietly] Yeah.
Right.
I'll do my best to be quick.
All conversations are more important than one with me.
translation.es: Es más importante hablar con los demás.

translation.en: [Massimo, in Italian] Excuse me.
[in Polish] Thanks for inviting us. I haven't had this much fun in ages.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no la pasaba tan bien.

translation.en: Mom, I'm not sure I can say the same about Dad.
translation.es: No sé si papá piense lo mismo.

translation.en: If the love of my life is having fun, so am I.
translation.es: Si el amor de mi vida se divierte, yo también.

translation.en: [Laura] You know what?
You've been married for 30 years,
and I wish Massimo looked at me the same way Dad looks at you.
translation.es: ojalá Massimo me mire como papá te mira a ti.

translation.en: Sweetie, you need to understand that marriage is about compromise.
translation.es: Cariño, debes entender que el matrimonio requiere llegar a acuerdos.

translation.en: Don't you agree, honey?
I wouldn't dare think otherwise.
translation.es: No te llevaría la contraria, cariño.

translation.en: And now… let's dance. Just you and me.
translation.es: Ahora vamos a bailar los dos solos.

translation.en: Do you feel okay?
Get me out from here.
[Laura] Can you stop the car, please?
[quietly] My God.
How could he be so stupid? And with her?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede ser tan idiota? ¿Y con ella?

translation.en: I wish I could go away from here and never come back.
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera irme de aquí y no volver nunca más.

translation.en: I'm flying home in a few hours.
translation.es: Volaré a casa en unas horas.

translation.en: We will find a ticket…
if you want to sort things out… away from here.
translation.es: y si quieres arreglar las cosas, te espero.

translation.en: Wait for a second.
[voice mail] The number you are trying to reach is currently unavailable. -Please try again later. -[line beeps]
translation.es: El número que marcó no está disponible. Llame de nuevo más tarde.

translation.en: [in Polish] Mom, I'm sorry. You were right.
I was wrong about Massimo.
After what I saw, I don't want to see him ever again. Obviously.
translation.es: Después de lo que vi, no quiero volver a verlo.

translation.en: I need to get away for a while and collect my thoughts.
translation.es: Obviamente. Necesito irme un rato y despejar la mente.

translation.en: Don't worry about me. I'm safe.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Estoy a salvo.

translation.en: I love you. I'll call in a few days.
translation.es: Te amo. Te llamaré en unos días.

translation.en: [in English] Take me anywhere, but take me away from here.
translation.es: Llévame a cualquier lado, pero que sea lejos de aquí.

translation.en: Wow, you look great.
I like you in this outfit.
I took what I found in the closet.
translation.es: Me puse lo que había en el armario.

translation.en: Maybe it's your girlfriend's?
I think she prefers a sporty style.
Sister's. I don't have a girlfriend, Laura.
translation.es: Es de mi hermana. No tengo novia.

translation.en: These are my sister's clothes.
translation.es: Es la ropa de mi hermana.

translation.en: Come.
Dinner is ready.
Look what I made for you. My favorite dish.
translation.es: Mira lo que te preparé. Mi plato favorito.

translation.en: -Paella. -But dinner?
Did I sleep so long?
It's so nice here.
It's my father's house.
translation.es: Es la casa de mi padre.

translation.en: Anyway, my sister Amelia will come by later.
translation.es: En fin, mi hermana Amelia vendrá más tarde.

translation.en: I think you will like each other.
She's a cool girl.
She's a bit moody.
You know,
pregnancy hormones.
Your sister is pregnant. I'm sorry.
Are you okay?
It's just a pity she chose an asshole for the father.
translation.es: Es una lástima que el padre sea un imbécil.

translation.en: Wait a moment.
I have to clean.
[Klara, in Polish] I'm gonna kill him! Excuse me. Leave me alone!
[in Italian] Let her through.
[in English] I have no idea where she--
What did you do to her? What did you do to my daughter?
She recorded a message saying she was leaving you.
translation.es: Me dejó un mensaje diciendo que te dejaba.

translation.en: She never wants to see you again.
I knew you were a bad person since I met you.
translation.es: Sabía que eras una mala persona desde que te conocí.

translation.en: I don't know what you did to her, but I know one thing.
translation.es: No sé qué le hiciste, pero estoy segura de algo.

translation.en: If my daughter decided to leave you,
she has a damn good reason for it!
We are going back to Poland.
We'll wait for her to come home.
translation.es: Esperaremos a que vuelva a casa.

translation.en: My husband is already in the car.
translation.es: Mi esposo ya está en el auto.

translation.en: Don't try to stop me.
[in Italian] Bring me Davide and Tommaso. Now.
translation.es: Tráeme a Davide y a Tommaso.

translation.en: Go!
[in English] Ignacio has been so sweet since I'm pregnant.
translation.es: Ignacio ha sido dulce desde el embarazo.

translation.en: I'm treated like a queen.
translation.es: Me trata como a una reina.

translation.en: How do you know that Nacho doesn't like him?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabes que a Nacho no le gusta?

translation.en: Because he's Sicilian.
I used to like Sicilians.
You used to love the Sicilians.
That's even worse.
I can see that your brother takes care a lot about you.
translation.es: Veo que tu hermano se preocupa mucho por ti.

translation.en: Yeah, Nacho is wonderful. The best.
Just don't tell him I said that. [chuckles]
translation.es: No le cuentes que dije eso.

translation.en: [sighs] I would like to see him finally settle down with some nice girl.
translation.es: Ojalá que por fin se organizara con una chica buena.

translation.en: Like you. He deserves it.
How do you know I'm nice? You just met me.
translation.es: No lo sabes. Acabas de conocerme.

translation.en: Intuition. It never disappoints me.
And there is something between you two, I hope.
translation.es: Y espero que haya algo entre ustedes dos.

translation.en: Oh, really?
But you know, my life got complicated, so right now, I have to fix it.
translation.es: Mi vida es complicada, así que debo arreglarla.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.
And you know that Nacho worked for me as a gardener?
translation.es: ¿Y sabes que Nacho era mi jardinero?

translation.en: [Amelia] As a gardener?
Oh my God, my brother will never cease to amaze me.
translation.es: Mi hermano nunca dejará de sorprenderme.

translation.en: So, you didn't know what he was doing in Sicily?
[Amelia] Honey, you can't keep up with Nacho.
He's the most spontaneous person I know, and he's also very loyal to his family.
translation.es: Es la persona más espontánea que conozco y también es muy leal a su familia.

translation.en: Maybe too loyal sometimes.
-[Nacho grunts] -Nacho!
-I did my hair and makeup. Come on. -[softly] Sorry.
translation.es: - Me peiné y me maquillé. - Lo siento.

translation.en: I forgive you.
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
[in Italian] A Sicilian man can only be understood
translation.es: Un siciliano solo puede ser entendido

translation.en: by a woman born and raised in Sicily.
translation.es: por una mujer que nació y creció en Sicilia.

translation.en: You can't expect a woman who's been living a normal life in Poland
translation.es: No puedes esperar que una mujer que lleva una vida normal en Polonia

translation.en: to be able to handle life with…
…an extraordinary man such as yourself.
translation.es: con un hombre extraordinario como tú.

translation.en: Let's put all that behind us.
Let's join forces and unite our families.
translation.es: Unamos nuestras fuerzas y la fuerza de nuestras familias.

translation.en: We will be indestructible.
Thanks for coming.
translation.es: Gracias por venir a esta hora.

translation.en: I had my doubts, but now I'm sure.
translation.es: Tenía dudas, pero ahora estoy seguro.

translation.en: Laura didn't leave on her own.
You were involved.
I'll find out what happened,
and you'll get what you deserve.
You're so good at it.
[clicks tongue] I'm not sure if it was a compliment
translation.es: No sé si fue un cumplido

translation.en: or you just cut my balls.
translation.es: o si me cortaste las pelotas.

translation.en: Anyway,
thank you.
[softly] I miss him.
I know.
But tell me one thing.
Why always good girls fall in love with bad guys?
translation.es: ¿Por qué las chicas buenas siempre se enamoran de los malos?

translation.en: How do you know I'm good?
Maybe something's wrong with me because he cheated on me.
translation.es: Tal vez tengo algo malo porque me engañó.

translation.en: don't you ever say that again.
It's not your fault.
A guy cheating on a woman like you must be an idiot.
translation.es: Un tipo que engaña a una mujer como tú debe ser un idiota.

translation.en: Without balls.
-Do you understand? -[both chuckle]
You understand.
Good.
We can watch the movie now.
And drink.
Smile.
[Laura] Thank you for letting me stay here.
[softly] You're welcome.
[in Italian] I told you it wasn't going to work
translation.es: Te dije que no iba a funcionar.

translation.en: and that he'd figure it out.
You should have done a better job. I played my part perfectly.
translation.es: Deberías haber sido más convincente. Hice mi parte perfectamente.

translation.en: [sighs] It's not like it was difficult!
She doesn't even know Massimo has a twin brother.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sabe que tiene un hermano gemelo.

translation.en: [sighs] I should have listened to my intuition.
-[knocking on door] -Come in.
What do you want?
I have a message.
Spit it out. I don't have all day.
translation.es: Habla. No tengo todo el día.

translation.en: She's not in Sicily.
-What did you say? -How come?
translation.es: - ¿Qué dijiste? - ¿Por qué no está en Sicilia?

translation.en: [man] She left with him.
Please, don't.
[spluttering] I'm just--
You're just a clown.
You just screwed up our plan.
Everything was ready. All you had to do was pick her up.
translation.es: Todo estaba listo. Solo debías recogerla.

translation.en: Will you take care of him…
…or should I do it?
Okay, calm down. Relax.
Have a seat on the couch, okay?
I will take care of it. Come on, now. Easy. Come on.
Okay. Shh.
Relax. It's all right.
Hey. Don't worry, okay?
Have somebody clean up this mess.
Fuck. My pants.
They're new.
[Domenico] Hello?
Yes. Okay.
Thank you.
We got confirmation.
He's on the island with him.
translation.es: Él está en la isla con él.

translation.en: Everything is ready.
He's waiting for the green light.
[Massimo] I know what to do in this kind of situation.
We can't be compared to this scum.
translation.es: No podemos ser como esta mierda.

translation.en: You know you can only rely on--
[in English] Hey!
[in Italian] …on yourself.
[in English] I'm here too, if you haven't noticed.
translation.es: Por si no lo notaron, estoy aquí.

translation.en: And if you are talking about Laura, I want to know everything, you understand?
translation.es: Si hablan de Laura, quiero saberlo todo, ¿entienden?

translation.en: Pumpkin, we're trying to do business--
[in Polish] Don't "pumpkin" me!
[in English] Laura is fucking gone,
and you're talking about business?
[in Polish] No fucking way!
[in English] Baby, please calm down.
I can't calm down. I'm Polish.
[in Polish] Dammit.
[in Italian] Wait. Wait.
Sit down.
[softly, in English] Make love with me.
You killed him?
Unfortunately not. He will be fine.
For now.
Are you okay?
[Laura] What happened last night?
Don't think about it.
You are safe here.
Tell me.
[Nacho] Someone broke in.
It's over now. The police will take care of it.
translation.es: Ya pasó. La policía se encargará.

translation.en: But… why would anyone break into your house?
translation.es: Pero ¿por qué alguien entraría a tu casa?

translation.en: And why can an ordinary gardener like you have all of this?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué un jardinero común y corriente puede tener todo esto?

translation.en: What a luxury life.
I told you.
My father is a wealthy man.
I'm trying to become independent of him.
Enjoy.
Sorry, 'cause you helped me in a very difficult moment in my life,
translation.es: Disculpa. Me ayudaste en un momento muy difícil de mi vida,

translation.en: and right now, I take it out on you.
translation.es: Disculpa. Me ayudaste en un momento muy difícil de mi vida, y ahora me desquito contigo.

translation.en: [Nacho] I deserve it.
[Laura] You do not deserve it.
Sometimes I act so irrational.
I'm sorry.
it's fine.
Now, let's eat. We have plans for today.
I do appreciate your good spirit, but, you know, because of last night,
translation.es: Aprecio tu buena onda, pero, por lo de anoche,

translation.en: I don't have a good mood to do anything special.
translation.es: no estoy de humor para nada especial.

translation.en: [Nacho] You're right.
It would be better if we stay at home and get upset about last night.
translation.es: Mejor quedémonos en casa y sintámonos mal por lo de anoche.

translation.en: So, where do you want to get upset?
In the dining room?
Or the dancing hall?
Or…
let me take you to a place where you can smile.
translation.es: te llevo a un lugar donde puedas sonreír.

translation.en: I promise if you don't smile there, we will come back here and weep together.
translation.es: Te prometo que si no sonríes allá, volveremos y lloraremos juntos aquí.

translation.en: Eat, please.
I think this car is so cool.
It's cooler than your husband's spaceship, huh?
translation.es: Más que la nave espacial de tu esposo.

translation.en: Corvette, 1992. The best year.
[Laura] Like wine?
I like this model.
[in Italian] Turn on the air conditioning.
Hello?
What?
Of course. Thanks.
What?
They weren't able to find her.
He survived.
Can you go any faster? Hurry up.
[Nacho, in English] Like it?
Yeah.
[Laura] I can say this one is, um, different than I used to drink.
translation.es: Es diferente a la que solía beber.

translation.en: Or maybe this one guy's just different from the ones you had before.
translation.es: Tal vez yo sea diferente a los tipos con los que saliste.

translation.en: It's so beautiful here, yeah?
[Nacho] We can only come here by sea.
translation.es: Solo se puede llegar por el mar.

translation.en: So, that's the perfect place for a date because you know you can't run away.
translation.es: Es perfecto para una cita porque no hay forma de huir.

translation.en: Success is guaranteed.
[Nacho] Yeah. That's true.
I usually come here with all my girlfriends.
translation.es: Suelo venir aquí con todas mis novias.

translation.en: From Poland.
Any of those Polish girlfriends ever escape from you?
translation.es: ¿Se te escapó alguna de esas novias polacas?

translation.en: Never.
[Laura] Hold my beer.
[Nacho] I will leave you with my sister for a moment.
translation.es: Te dejaré un rato con mi hermana.

translation.en: I need to take care of one thing.
[Amelia] Hi, guys.
-Hi. -[Amelia] Hi.
Wow, you look so gorgeous in that dress.
translation.es: Te ves hermosa en ese vestido.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Ladies.
I can see you won't be missing me too much.
translation.es: Veo que no me extrañarán mucho.

translation.en: But I hope you will miss me a little bit.
translation.es: Ojalá me extrañen al menos un poco.

translation.en: Let's sit.
How are you?
I'm going for a swim.
What's wrong?
I will teach you something.
[Laura] What?
Surfing without waves.
[screams] I don't have an outfit! Stop!
No! [squeals]
Now it doesn't matter.
[in Italian] Massimo. Excuse me.
What is it?
Call Tommaso. We have to go. Get everything ready.
translation.es: Llama a Tommaso. Debemos irnos. Prepáralo todo.

translation.en: [Nacho, in English] Are you having a nightmare
or just an erotic dream?
Nobody taught you that gentlemen
do not come to a woman's bedroom uninvited?
translation.es: no van al cuarto de una mujer sin ser invitados?

translation.en: Technically speaking, this is my bedroom
translation.es: Podría decirse que es mi cuarto,

translation.en: that I'm sharing with you
so you don't have to sleep on the beach.
translation.es: para que no tengas que dormir en la playa.

translation.en: You must admit
that I am a real gentleman.
Anyway, I just came to tell you that food is ready.
translation.es: En fin, solo vine a decirte que la comida está lista.

translation.en: Was it… a nightmare
or just an erotic dream?
-It was sex. -[Nacho] With whom?
With you.
And did you like it to be?
It was pretty good, but in my entire life, I had better.
translation.es: Fue bastante bueno, pero no tanto como otras veces.

translation.en: This is my asylum.
One day, I would like to leave here for good with someone like you.
translation.es: Me gustaría vivir aquí algún día con alguien como tú.

translation.en: But for now, you're stuck here with me, so… I'm not going anywhere… yet.
translation.es: Por ahora, estás estancado aquí conmigo. No me iré a ningún lado todavía.

translation.en: We are going to see my father today.
translation.es: Vamos a ver a papá hoy.

translation.en: [Laura] And? That makes you worried, or what?
I've already met your sister, and you're not going to tell him
translation.es: Ya conocí a tu hermana, y no le vas a decir

translation.en: that we're getting married or something like this. So?
translation.es: que nos vamos a casar o algo así.

translation.en: Massimo will be there.
[in English] Who are you?
And stop telling me bullshit about being a gardener.
translation.es: Deja de mentir con que eres jardinero.

translation.en: This is the only moment that you can tell me the truth.
translation.es: Es el momento de decir la verdad.

translation.en: I am Marcelo "Nacho" Matos,
son of Don Fernando Matos,
the head of the local Mafia
translation.es: el capo de la mafia local

translation.en: and eternal rival of your husband's family.
translation.es: y eterno rival de la familia de tu esposo.

translation.en: So, your father told you to bring me to the island?
translation.es: ¿Tu padre te pidió que me trajeras?

translation.en: No. You came here because you wanted to.
What if I didn't want to?
I would've found a way.
[Laura] Fuck.
I was so naive.
I thought that you were my real friend
translation.es: Pensé que eras un amigo de verdad,

translation.en: and nothing was a coincidence.
Laura, I wasn't faking my feelings for you.
translation.es: Laura, no fingía lo que siento por ti.

translation.en: So I guess I have to thank you.
'Cause you proved that men aren't good.
Only good at lying.
You think I would fake all of this?
Take you to the beach?
Teach you to surf?
And the kiss?
You didn't feel it was real?
It was real, like a fairy tale.
And if you think I would fall in love again with a guy who thinks
translation.es: Si crees que me volvería a enamorar

translation.en: he can have me just like that, you're absolutely wrong.
translation.es: de un tipo que cree que puede tenerme así, te equivocas.

translation.en: 'Cause I've learned from my mistakes,
and I've learned that you're a fuckin' liar.
translation.es: Aprendí que eres un mentiroso, mierda.

translation.en: [Nacho] Be rational.
I didn't make you come here.
You came with me because you felt safe.
translation.es: Viniste conmigo porque te sentías segura.

translation.en: You ruined everything since the moment you hid the truth from me.
translation.es: Lo arruinaste todo al ocultar la verdad.

translation.en: And I'm done with guys who think that they can do whatever they want.
translation.es: Me cansé de los tipos que creen que pueden hacer lo que quieran.

translation.en: Take me there.
Let's end with these gangster games.
Fuck. [exhales]
I always dreamed of living in a beach house
translation.es: Siempre soñé con vivir en la playa

translation.en: and opening a surf school.
translation.es: y abrir una escuela de surf.

translation.en: I was just unlucky to be born into the wrong family.
translation.es: Tuve la mala suerte de nacer en la familia equivocada.

translation.en: My father had different plans for me.
translation.es: Papá tenía otros planes para mí.

translation.en: Laura, for God's sake, you are the wife of a Mafia boss.
translation.es: Laura, por Dios, eres la esposa de un capo.

translation.en: You know how important the loyalty is for the family.
translation.es: Sabes la importancia de la lealtad con la familia.

translation.en: When the Mob boss is your father,
translation.es: Cuando el capo es tu padre,

translation.en: you don't have much choice.
[Laura] No. You always have a choice.
The thing is, you have to take responsibility of your own life.
translation.es: Debes asumir la responsabilidad de tu propia vida.

translation.en: What?
-Be careful. -[Laura] Oh, really?
I don't think anything worse than the last few days could happen.
translation.es: Nada será peor que los últimos días.

translation.en: Thank you for accepting the invitation to the meeting.
[Massimo] I didn't really have a choice.
Oh, I would like to apologize that we are meeting
in such unpleasant circumstances, but I believe that, as a businessman,
translation.es: en circunstancias tan desagradables, pero, como hombre de negocios, entenderá que el fin justifica los medios.

translation.en: you will understand that the goal justifies the means.
translation.es: pero, como hombre de negocios, entenderá que el fin justifica los medios.

translation.en: After all, the stakes are high.
translation.es: Después de todo, hay mucho en juego.

translation.en: Our family had the non-aggression pact.
translation.es: Nuestra familia tenía un pacto de no agresión.

translation.en: You violated it.
Oh, your father and I, we were both men of honor.
translation.es: Tu padre y yo éramos hombres de honor.

translation.en: As long as he was alive,
we both respected the borders of our interests.
translation.es: respetamos las fronteras de nuestros intereses.

translation.en: [takes a deep breath] But you, Massimo,
you're expanding too much.
Some people don't like it.
Some people?
Some people, who?
You?
[Fernando] We have been sending you warnings.
Laura's accident.
But you were too convinced of your own strength.
translation.es: Estás demasiado convencido de tu propia fuerza.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Your father was wise.
He knew that no opponent should be taken lightly.
translation.es: Sabía que todo oponente es peligroso.

translation.en: I cannot bear…
more chances with you as a boss.
All the families would benefit from someone more, uh,
controllable to be in your place.
translation.es: de alguien más controlable en tu lugar.

translation.en: We figured your stupid brother will do perfect.
He's so blinded with revenge and greed
translation.es: La venganza y la codicia lo ciegan,

translation.en: that he doesn't care much for the family business.
translation.es: y no le importa el negocio familiar.

translation.en: You're wrong.
You're wrong… if you think I'm gonna put my father's empire
translation.es: Se equivoca si cree que pondré el imperio de mi padre

translation.en: into the hands of a dog.
Sit down. Massimo--
[panting] A traitor who put my dad into the hands of Death!
translation.es: Un traidor que es responsable de la muerte de mi padre.

translation.en: You're fucking wrong!
Let me remind you that your wife is still with us.
translation.es: Te recuerdo que tenemos a tu esposa.

translation.en: You call yourself a man of honor?
And you use my wife this way?
Massimo, coming here with Nacho was Laura's decision.
Nobody made her do it.
I need to see my wife.
I need to see my wife. Now.
Oh, I can assure you that she's safe.
translation.es: Te aseguro que está a salvo.

translation.en: Marcelo brought her to the island and has been taking care for her.
translation.es: Marcelo la trajo a la isla y la ha estado cuidando.

translation.en: Now she's with Miguel, my personal bodyguard.
translation.es: Ahora está con Miguel, mi guardaespaldas personal.

translation.en: [in English] What?
[in English] We need to go. Now.
[Laura] You were the biggest mistake of my life.
translation.es: Fuiste el peor error de mi vida.

translation.en: How could you?
How could you?
You're not Massimo.
No. [sniffles]
I'm not.
[inhales sharply] I am Adriano Torricelli.
The twin brother who was so unlucky because he was born ten minutes later.
translation.es: El hermano gemelo que tuvo mala suerte porque nació diez minutos después.

translation.en: Ten minutes. Ten minutes.
But it's nice to meet you,
baby girl.
[Laura] Do not call me "baby girl."
-Where is Massimo? -[Adriano] He's not too far.
Not too far. [inhales sharply]
But I think that you have to wait a little longer.
translation.es: Pero debes esperar un poco más.

translation.en: He's a busy man.
[clicks tongue] Yeah, I'm happy to spend a lot of time with my new sister-in-law,
translation.es: Me alegra pasar tiempo con mi cuñada nueva

translation.en: you know, and have a little chat with her.
translation.es: y charlar un poco con ella.

translation.en: We have nothing to talk about. I disagree.
translation.es: - No hay nada que hablar. - No estoy de acuerdo.

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you a story about taking back what's mine.
translation.es: Te contaré una historia sobre recuperar lo que es mío.

translation.en: I mean, my dad is no longer an obstacle, yeah.
translation.es: Mi papá ya no es un obstáculo.

translation.en: And now…
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
[spluttering] I have to get rid of your husband.
Don't worry, Laura. [chuckles]
I won't leave you alone with him.
translation.es: No te dejaré sola con él.

translation.en: -[music fades] -[Laura] What are you doing here?
What does it look like I'm doing? [scoffs]
[sighs] I'm winning.
Massimo made a huge mistake
by underestimating the anger of the abandoned woman.
translation.es: al subestimar la ira de una mujer abandonada.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
You were supposed to wait in Sicily until the negotiations were over.
translation.es: Debías esperar en Sicilia hasta que terminaran las negociaciones.

translation.en: You know them?
Honey, we were the ones who pushed you into his arms.
translation.es: Cariño, nosotros fuimos los que te empujamos a sus brazos.

translation.en: [in Italian] Did you really think you could just say the word
translation.es: ¿De verdad creíste que una palabra sería suficiente

translation.en: and I'd disappear from your life?
translation.es: para que desapareciera como un perro?

translation.en: That I would've lived off your handouts in exile?
translation.es: ¿Que habría vivido en el exilio con tu caridad?

translation.en: You finally showed your weakness.
Question is,
do you really think this little whore's worth the whole empire our father created?
translation.es: si crees que esta zorra vale el imperio que creó nuestro padre.

translation.en: Though I have to say, she's not bad. [kisses]
translation.es: Aunque debo decir que no está mal.

translation.en: [in English] Sometimes I wonder
if your child
would've looked more like you…
translation.es: se habría parecido más a ti

translation.en: [smacks lips] …or like her.
It's a pity.
It's a pity that we will never know.
translation.es: Es una pena que nunca lo sepamos.

translation.en: Because of the accident.
